{{cpp/filesystem/title|space_info}}
{{cpp/filesystem/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl header|filesystem}}
{{dcl|since=c++17|1=
struct space_info {
    std::uintmax_t capacity;
    std::uintmax_t free; 
    std::uintmax_t available; 
};
}}
{{dcl end}}

Represents the filesystem information as determined by {{rlpt|space|filesystem::space}}.

===Member objects===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc mem obj|nolink=true|capacity|total size of the filesystem, in bytes}}
{{dsc mem obj|nolink=true|free|free space on the filesystem, in bytes}}
{{dsc mem obj|nolink=true|available|free space available to a non-privileged process (may be equal or less than {{tt|free}})}}
{{dsc end}}

===Non-member functions===
{{dsc begin}}
{{dsc fun|cpp/filesystem/space_info|title=operator==|inlinemem=true|compares two {{tt|space_info}}s|notes={{mark c++20}}}}
{{dsc end}}

{{member|operator{{==}}&lt;small&gt;(std::filesystem::space_info)&lt;/small&gt;|{{ddcl|since=c++20|1= 
friend bool operator==( const space_info&amp;, const space_info&amp; ) = default;
}}

Checks if {{tt|capacity}}, {{tt|free}} and {{tt|available}} of both arguments are equal respectively.

{{cpp/hidden friend|std::filesystem::space_info}}
